arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يَلۡبِسُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنَهُم بِظُلۡمٍ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡنُ وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
translation: (82) They who believe and do not mix their belief with injustice[323] - those will have security, and they are [rightly] guided.
footnotes: [323]- Specifically, the association of others in divinity with Allāh.
